subject: Untitled Cinquains
text:
Candles  
I will light in  
Faraway lands hallowed  
By monks; I pray you'll fly away   
With me.  

 9-17-94  
 Kyiv, Ukraine  

Rings  
Rings, rings  
For ding-a-lings!  
In the ears, eyelids and  
Nose, plus tintinabula for  
The toes!  

 8-4-96  
 Los Angeles, California
